isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - CAB: 5000, 9100, 9200, 9300, 9400 - REMOVE AND INSTALL - ELECTRIC WIPER MOTOR (COWL MOUNTED, AFTER JULY 1, 1993)

svcproc.title: ELECTRIC WIPER MOTOR (COWL MOUNTED, AFTER JULY 1, 1993)

note.para: The electric wiper motor is not serviceable and is replaced as a unit.

svcprocinfo.para: The electric wiper motor is located in the cowl behind the dash panel cover.

svcsubproc.title: Remove
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 104 for Items in parentheses unless otherwise noted.

figure.caption: Figure 104. Wiper Motor Assembly and Mounting

calloutgroup.callout1: 7. MOUNTING BOLTS/WASHERS 240 TO 265 IN-LBS. (27 TO 30 NM)

step1.para: Remove the 4 screws that secure the passenger side (right) instrument panel to the dash.
Remove instrument panel to dash panel brace.
Disconnect the wiper motor wiring harness connector (Item 8).
Remove the 4 bolts and flat washers (Item 7) that secure the wiper motor mounting plate to the dash panel bracket (Item 9).

Pull the motor assembly (Item 1) out, enough to remove the spring clip (Item 4) that holds the wiper linkage (Items 5 and 6) on the crank pivot arm (Item 3). Refer to Figure 105 for spring clip removal.

note.para: Do not remove the pivot arm from the wiper motor.

step1.para: Remove the wiper motor assembly (Item 1) from the vehicle.

svcsubproc.title: Install
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 104 for Items in parentheses unless otherwise noted.

note.para: Replacement wiper motors are supplied with the motor attached to the mounting plate and the crank arm attached to the shaft of the motor. DO NOT remove the mounting plate or crank arm for installation.

step1.para: Lubricate the crank pivot arm ends of the wiper linkage (Items 5 and 6) with EP2 Moly Grease or equivalent.

Hold the wiper motor assembly (Item 1) in position at the dash panel bracket (Item 9), then install the passenger side (right) and then the driver side (left) wiper linkage (Items 6 and 5) onto the crank pivot arm (Item 3). Install the spring clip. Refer to Figure 106 for spring clip installation.
Place the wiper motor assembly (Item 1) in position on the dash panel bracket (Item 9) and secure with the flat washers and bolts (Item 7). Tighten to 240 to 265 in-lbs. (27 to 30 Nm).
Connect the wiper motor wiring harness connector (Item 8).
Install the instrument panel to dash panel brace.
Position the passenger side (right) instrument panel in place and install the 4 mounting screws.
